name: Plants Vs Insects
description:
During the day, mushrooms are afk. During the night, plants are afk. Survive against the insects. 

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022 https://globalgamejam.org/2022/jam-sites/singapore-global-game-jam-2022.
